title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, published on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with model management, multi-user, RAG, and plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Retrieval-Augmented-Generation template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and plugins.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) maintained by the Ollama team.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfile recipes for niche and fine-tuned models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats using local Ollama models and supports slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with thread support and model switching via emojis.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client crate for Ollama with tokio and serde support.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API that exposes Ollama endpoints with user quotas and caching.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama’s REST API with async HTTP and JSON handling.

title: ollama-rf
summary: Robot Framework library that provides keywords to chat with Ollama models in test cases.
